name: Suspicious Bitsadmin Job via PowerShell
description: Detect download by BITS jobs via PowerShell
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:*Start\-BitsTransfer*)`
